page.title: 14River Mole near Fetcham.
page.content: The River Mole starts at Gatwick Airport.From Gatwick it flows to Molesey and into the Thames.In our block the river has lots of meanders and flows North-West.There are three weirs which changes the level of the water.Trees grow near the river because of the rich,moist soil. There are three tributaries in our block.One leads to Pachesham Lake. There are some buildings near the river like the Sewage Farm,Slyfield House,Brook Willow Farm. Most residential areas are away from the river because of flooding risks. The river passes under the M_25 motorway three times in our block. There is one bridge and two culverts. The river is most enjoyable and is used for leisure. Children and adults fish, swim and canoe there.
